a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: R&D researchers per million people vs. GDP per capita, 2021
Professionals conceiving or creating new knowledge, products, processes, methods, or systems. This data is
adjusted for inflation and differences in the cost of living between countries.
Researchers in R&D (per million people) (researchers per million people)
Data source: UNESCO (via World Bank); Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
Note: Postgraduate students are included. This data is expressed in international-$ at 2017 prices.
